model.name: SvcModel
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW SvcView ( RowId integer, id long, patientId long, dateRead timestamp, mam boolean, sys long, dia long, pulse long, map long, glucoseType clob, glucoseValue long, glucoseLabel clob, note clob, PRIMARY KEY(RowId) ) AS SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY id), id, patientId, dateRead, mam, sys, dia, pulse, map, glucoseType, glucoseValue, glucoseLabel, note FROM READING;
